anime_boy.name: Anime Boy
anime_boy.description: Stylized anime boy — soft shading, big eyes, warm colors
anime_boy.example_prompt: A stylized anime boy portrait, warm lighting, soft shading, detailed hair, golden eyes, studio portrait
anime_boy.notes: Use anime-specific SD checkpoint or LoRA. Use higher CFG (7-9).

anime_girl.name: Anime Girl
anime_girl.description: Stylized anime girl — cinematic lighting, vibrant color
anime_girl.example_prompt: A stylized anime girl portrait, cinematic lighting, vibrant colors, detailed hair, soft skin texture
anime_girl.notes: Use anime SD (or SDXL anime finetune) for best results.

tiger_3d.name: Tiger 3D
tiger_3d.description: Semi-realistic tiger character with expressive eyes — cinematic studio lighting
tiger_3d.example_prompt: A semi-realistic tiger portrait with anthropomorphic expression, cinematic studio lighting, detailed fur, warm contrast
tiger_3d.notes: Prefer SD2.1 or custom animal model; use ControlNet for pose/face landmarks.

monkey_3d.name: Monkey 3D
monkey_3d.description: Cute monkey character, cartoon to semi-realistic depending on style
monkey_3d.example_prompt: Cute monkey portrait, slightly cartoonish, bright eyes, soft fur textures, studio lighting
monkey_3d.notes: Tune prompts to get anthropomorphic expressions.

human_cartoon.name: Human Cartoon
human_cartoon.description: Cartoonized human avatar — friendly, simplified geometry
human_cartoon.example_prompt: Cartoonized human avatar, soft edges, friendly expression, studio portrait, 3D-look shading
human_cartoon.notes: Good for YouTube-host avatars; use consistent LoRA for face consistency.
